amendment.description: To implement responsible subcommittee reorganization in the Committee on Appropriations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4042 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4042 proposed by Senator Hutchison to Amendment SA 4015. (consideration: CR S10908-10909; text: CR S10908) To implement responsible subcommittee reorganization in the Committee on Appropriations.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4042 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4042 proposed by Senator Hutchison to Amendment SA 4015.
